trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Park City
There was one other sighting in Park City on or around November 8th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe Were driving from salt lake city to Heber City and we noticed a very bright blinking object out of the window, we pulled off the road and watched it make spastic movements up, down, side to side the a red blinking object was ejected off of it and made more spastic movements as it slowly descended then the main object disappeared then appeared over a mile in the distance where it blinked for a few seconds then was gone completely and the red blinking object disappeared behind a hill and we didn't see it again
Summary: Hovered above ground, spastic movements ejected red flashing object then dissapeared red object descended making spastic movements original object appeared over a mile away dissapeared
